content: this is a legal summary of a court case that took place in bari in 2011 the case involved compensation but the parties and details are not mentioned the case lasted for 12 years and the judge made a final ruling the judge declared the legal succession of a person named md who passed away in 1993 the judge ordered the dissolution of the community hereditary property and awarded certain properties to a person named laan laan was also ordered to pay certain sums of money to the coheirs listed in the ruling the judge stated that the costs of the proceedings would be compensated by the parties involved and ordered the parties to pay for the costs of an experts report the court determined the division of an inheritance with the surviving spouse receiving the largest share of the estate the court also determined the monetary adjustments for each party laan was ordered to pay the other coheirs their respective shares the court stated that court costs should be borne by the parties in proportion to their shares and that the costs of the experts report should be paid by the coheirs the ruling was made in bari in 2011 and filed with the registry on february 28 2011
